price: Na mmom obia obewia (neho akͻ) tie no deε ogya frama pefee bedi n’akyi.
arabic: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱسۡتَرَقَ ٱلسَّمۡعَ فَأَتۡبَعَهُۥ شِهَابٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: illā mani is'taraqa al-samʿa fa-atbaʿahu shihābun mubīnun
